availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John M. Waggener (Union County, Kentucky, deputy clerk)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, deputy clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Harrison W. Waggener and Pamela M. Waggener. Married to Sallie H. Waggener. Father of Eulah L. Waggener and Kimpie R. Waggener. Resident of Union County in 1860. Deputy clerk of the Union Circuit Court in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 206; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 1; Find A Grave, "John M. Waggener (1841-1918)," Memorial #106242109, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=106242109&ref=acom (accessed May 8, 2017); KYR-0001-007-0366.
